designScenario.description: The Evacuation Control System is designed to orchestrate a coordinated and safe evacuation of an aircraft during emergencies. It integrates advanced door actuation, dynamic cabin guidance, and synchronized emergency lighting with real-time avionics data. The system is optimized to ensure immediate activation, continuous reliability, and fault-tolerant operation under rigorous aviation standards. It also offers a user-friendly interface for cabin crew to monitor system status and perform manual overrides if necessary.
designScenario.name: Evacuation Control System

details.description: Automatically actuate emergency doors and activate directional signage immediately upon detecting critical flight parameters.
Interface with sensors in the avionic suite to validate emergency conditions before initiating protocols.
Guarantee system response to emergency triggers within 2 seconds to minimize delay.
Maintain continuous real-time communication with avionics and lighting modules during evacuation events.
Implement triple redundancy in sensor and actuator circuits to secure operational integrity even with isolated component failures.
Deploy fail-safe logic that ensures system activation only upon verified emergency conditions, minimizing false alarms.
Provide an intuitive interface for cabin crew, incorporating clear alert indicators and manual override options.
Support regular automated diagnostics, remote firmware updates, and compliance with aircraft maintenance schedules.

relationships.description: The Evacuation Control Module depends on the Cabin Guidance Module to relay directional information during evacuation processes.
The Emergency Lighting Assembly is aggregated by the Evacuation Control Module to provide synchronized visual evacuation cues.
The Avionics Integration Module composes the overall system by integrating sensor data from the aircraft's central avionics to trigger system activation.

rag_context: Evacuation Control System是一个管理安全疏散协议的系统，通过集成先进的门控机制和方向指引系统来确保安全疏散。它设计符合严格的飞机工程标准，侧重于快速激活、操作可靠性和强大的故障安全措施。系统与中央控制单元和紧急照明模块无缝接口，确保在关键情况下，疏散信号能够迅速触发，引导乘客安全疏散。系统具有以下规格说明：响应时间为3秒，工作温度范围为-20°C至70°C，采用三重模块冗余的容错策略，MTBF为20000小时，备用电源为双电源供应和电池备份。此外，系统还包括功能性、性能、安全和非功能性要求，如疏散激活、响应性能、故障安全和冗余性、界面和可维护性等方面的设计要求。
